kpi.revenue.label: Revenue (This month)
kpi.revenue.action: If revenue fell >5% vs last month, review top 3 products.
kpi.churn.label: Churn Rate
kpi.churn.why: Percentage of customers who stopped paying.
kpi.churn.action: If churn > 5%, consider a win-back campaign.
kpi.engagement.label: Engagement Rate
kpi.engagement.why: How active your audience is (likes + comments / views).
kpi.engagement.action: Low engagement? Try asking questions in your videos.
kpi.ctr.label: Click-Through Rate (CTR)
kpi.ctr.why: Percentage of people who clicked your ad.
kpi.ctr.action: If CTR < 1%, test new ad creatives.
kpi.cpa.label: Cost Per Acquisition (CPA)
kpi.cpa.why: Average cost to acquire a new customer.
kpi.cpa.action: If CPA is rising, check your ad targeting.
upload.drag_drop: Drag & drop your CSV files here, or click to select
upload.error: Upload failed. Please check your file format.
segments.tooltip.label: Cluster Label
